description: Approval of details pursuant condition 6 (brickwork) of Listed Building Consent ref: P111487 dated 10 October, 2011.
decision_conditions:
a) Pointing shall be flush/semi-recessed; mortar mix shall be lime based and no harder than 1:3:9      (cement:lime:sand) as confirmed by email dated 16/02/12.
b) Scaffold fixings should be made in existing mortar joints where possible. Any repair works to or replacement of individual bricks to the main elevation following scaffolding removal shall match the existing adjacent work with regard to the methods used and to material, colour, texture and profile. A detailed method statement for the proposed repair/replacement of individual bricks shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of the repair work. All such works and finishes shall be maintained as such thereafter.
